item.description:
Eichmann's End: Love, Betrayal, Death Raymond Ley 2010 Categories: Anti-Semitism, Drama, Family Relationships, Fiction, History, Holocaust, Latin America, Romance Average Rating: My Rating: 1 2 3 4 5 Run time: 90 min. | aka: Eichmann's Ende | Germany,Israel | Language: German, Hebrew, Spanish with subtitles | Film Format: Video

 

In mid-1950’s Buenos Aires, Holocaust survivor Lothar Hermann’s suspicions are aroused when his teenage daughter, Sylvia, introduces her new beau: Nick Eichmann. Meanwhile, Nick’s father, the notorious Nazi Adolf Eichmann, is dictating his memoirs to a local journalist, proudly recounting his masterminding of the murder of millions of Jews. With Sylvia’s help, Adolf Eichmann is captured and brought to trial in Israel. A drama based on a true story. New England Premiere 1 video Videos 4 pictures Pictures buy tickets related links official film site >> film details screenings reviews
